mosaicode.model package¶

Submodules¶

mosaicode.model.blockmodel module¶

class mosaicode.model.blockmodel.BlockModel(block=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

This class contains the base attributes of each block, their position on the screen, id and others applicable properties for each one.

get_color()[source]¶

Get the color in RGB format and return in hexadecimal.

Returns:
  • Types: str

The return is the hex value reference to color. The hex value is a str type.

get_color_as_rgba()[source]¶

Returns the color in RGBA format.

Returns:
  • Types: str

The return is the RGBA color. The hex value is a str type.
